list_definition.definition: the sticky, fatty substance of which bees make their cells; beeswax
the sticky, yellowish substance formed in the ears.
a manufactured, fatty substance used in polishing, to give a good shine
(also candle-wax) (of) a substance made from paraffin, used in making candles, models etc, that melts when heated
to smear, polish or rub with wax

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He waxes and polishes his car every Sunday morning.

list_definition.definition: (of the moon) to appear to grow in size as more of it becomes visible.
an old word for to grow or increase.
